revision.text: Possibly: The elements of Euclid, viz. the first six books, together with the eleventh and twelfth : in this edition, the errors, by which Theon, or others, have long ago vitiated these books, are corrected, and some of Euclid's demonstrations are restored / by Robert Simson, M. D. Professor of Mathematics in the University of Glasgow. (Glasgow : Printed by Robert and Andrew Foulis printers to the University, M.DCC.LVI. [1756]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1856555~S1
